title: GlobalExchange
author: GlobalExchange
content: Hey guys,We are looking for someone to take care of our servers and set up websites for us. The infrastructure is always the same:Domain -> Reverse Proxy -> Backend ServerWhich skills you should master perfectly:- Linux (Debian)- Nginx- Certbot / SSL Management- Configuring reverse Proxy- Configuring Backend- Setup Wordpress / Custom Webpage- SSL secured Traffic Route between Servers- Securing NginxWe pay by the hour or by a fixed price per page set up. We are interested in long-term partnerships.Telegram: https://t.me/authentic6192Skype: https://join.skype.com/invite/EoZliMAEAlQq
